urgent.action: Implement 301 redirect from http://konacoffeedonut.com/en to https://konacoffeedonut.com/en. Check Vercel config for redirect rules.
urgent.reasoning: HTTP page has 105 impressions (highest!) but 0 clicks at position 11.25. Google indexing both versions splits authority and loses ~10+ potential clicks weekly.

urgent.action: Audit mobile page speed and UX. For a Waikiki coffee shop, mobile should be 70%+ of traffic, not 15%.
urgent.reasoning: Mobile at 15% vs Desktop 25% is inverted for local food business. Tourists search on phones. Low mobile share suggests Core Web Vitals issues.

urgent.action: Publish blog post and update homepage with Feb 25, 2026 grand opening details. Add structured data for Event schema.
urgent.reasoning: Opening in 3 days! Brand searches show 44.4% CTR interest. Capture searches for 'new coffee shop waikiki' now.

quickWins.action: Add 'donuts near me' and 'best donuts Waikiki' to homepage H2 or meta description. Create dedicated Donuts page.
quickWins.reasoning: 19 impressions at position 10.8 with 0 clicks. Moving to position 5-7 could capture 2-4 clicks/week.

quickWins.action: Strengthen donut-focused content. Current position 9 is close to first page top. Add donut variety descriptions.
quickWins.reasoning: Position 9 with 6 impressions. Easy push to position 5-6 with on-page optimization.

quickWins.action: Rewrite About Kona Coffee page title/meta to include 'Waikiki' and 'Hawaiian'. Current 2.9% CTR needs improvement.
quickWins.reasoning: 34 impressions but only 1 click (2.9% CTR). Page ranks well (position 6.4) but doesn't compel clicks.

quickWins.action: Add business hours schema markup. Include 'open now' messaging on homepage.
quickWins.reasoning: Position 7.5 is strong. 'Open now' queries convert high. Schema hours helps Google show you for these queries.

opportunities.action: Create location-specific landing page: 'Coffee Shop in Waikiki Beach' with embedded Google Map and nearby landmarks.
opportunities.reasoning: 'coffee near me' has 8 impressions at position 16.9. Dedicated local page could push to page 1 for high-volume term.

opportunities.action: Enhance Japanese language page (/ja). Add hreflang tags. Japan has 34 impressions - tourists researching before visiting.
opportunities.reasoning: Japan is 2nd largest market. Japanese tourists are major Waikiki demographic. Localized content could 3x Japanese traffic.

opportunities.action: Ensure Google Business Profile is claimed and optimized with photos, menu, and opening date announcement.
opportunities.reasoning: Local pack visibility is crucial for 'near me' queries. GBP drives both maps visibility and organic CTR.

insights.observation: Brand keyword 'kona coffee donut' ranks #1.1 with 44.4% CTR (8 clicks from 18 impressions)
insights.suggestion: Protect brand by ensuring consistent NAP across directories. Consider running brand + location ads closer to opening.

insights.observation: Desktop dominates (25%) vs Mobile (15%) - unusual for local food business
insights.suggestion: Prioritize mobile Core Web Vitals. Test on 3G. Consider AMP for key pages.

insights.observation: USA 94% of impressions, Japan 1.6%, Germany minimal
insights.suggestion: Focus on US local SEO first. Japanese market is bonus - consider partnerships with travel blogs.

insights.observation: Grand opening Feb 25 is in 3 days - critical window for launch content
insights.suggestion: Publish opening day content NOW. Submit to local news, food blogs. Share on social with location tags.
